name: Booze Blues
description:
You play as Speedy Jimmy, the bootlegger, as you traverse the harsh Canadian wilderness to get to a speakeasy in Citytown, USA.

It's the prohibition and people are thirsty! Bring as much hooch as you can!

Use your stockpile of booze to defend yourself, or don't! That liquid is precious!

Levels are randomized every new game!

Part of the AwfulSummerJam 2017 (http://www.awfuljams.com/)

Art: - Chernabog

Programming: - Lysdexic - Hats4Cats
